pages.services: Explore Our Services - Custom Bouquets, Same-Day Delivery, and More | FloraFlick +91-881-8881136 floraflick@gmail.com FloraFlick Home Services They choose us Promise How does it work Favorite customers Our Services At FloraFlick, we offer a range of services to cater to your floral needs. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply brightening someone's day, our dedicated team is here to provide exceptional service and quality bouquets. Custom Bouquets Create a personalized bouquet with our expert florists. Choose your favorite flowers and colors for a unique arrangement that perfectly suits your vision. Same-Day Delivery Need flowers delivered urgently? We offer same-day delivery in select areas, ensuring your bouquet arrives fresh and on time. Corporate Events Make a lasting impression at your corporate events with our elegant floral arrangements. We specialize in creating sophisticated displays tailored to your brand. Subscription Services Enjoy regular deliveries of fresh flowers with our subscription services. Perfect for keeping your space vibrant or sending thoughtful gifts on a recurring basis. Wedding and Event Floral Design Let us make your special day unforgettable with our bespoke wedding and event floral designs. Our experienced team will work closely with you to create stunning arrangements that enhance the beauty of your venue and reflect your personal style. Why Choose FloraFlick? Our Commitment to Excellence Quality Assurance We guarantee the freshness and quality of every bouquet. Each flower is hand-selected and arranged with care by our skilled florists. Customization Options Personalize your order with special add-ons like chocolates, balloons, or personalized notes to make your gift even more special. Expert Advice Our knowledgeable team is here to offer expert advice on flower selection, arrangement styles, and more. We ensure you get the perfect bouquet for every occasion. Eco-Friendly Practices We are committed to sustainability. Our packaging is eco-friendly, and we support responsible sourcing practices to minimize our environmental impact. 100% Freshness Guarantee 24/7 Customer Support 500+ Happy Clients 5 Years of Experience Additional Services Beyond Bouquets Event Styling Elevate your event with our floral decor services. From weddings to corporate gatherings, we create stunning floral arrangements that complement any setting. Weekly Office Flowers Boost workplace morale with our weekly flower subscriptions. We deliver fresh blooms to your office, adding a touch of beauty and freshness to your workspace. Funeral Arrangements Compassionate floral tributes for times of loss. Our respectful arrangements provide comfort and honor the memory of loved ones. By accessing our website (the "Site") and using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use ("Terms"). If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please do not use our Site. Use of the Site The use of this Site is solely for personal and non-commercial purposes, unless otherwise agreed upon in writing by FloraFlick. User Accounts In order to access certain features of the Site, you may be required to create a user account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. Orders and Payments When you place an order through FloraFlick, you agree to provide accurate and complete information. Prices for products are subject to change without notice. Shipping and Delivery We strive to deliver orders promptly. However, delivery times may vary depending on location and other factors beyond our control. Returns and Refunds Our return policy allows for returns within 30 days of purchase. Please refer to our Return Policy for more details. Prohibited Activities You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities: (a) copying, distributing, or disclosing any part of the Site in any medium; (b) attempting to interfere with, compromise the system integrity, or security of the Site; (c) using any automated system, including without limitation "robots," "spiders," or "offline readers," to access the Site. These communications may include notices about your account (e.g., password resets and payment authorizations) and promotional emails. You agree that any notices, agreements, disclosures, or other communications that we send to you electronically will satisfy any legal communication requirements, including that such communications be in writing. Intellectual Property The trademarks, logos, service marks, and trade names displayed on the Site are registered and unregistered trademarks of FloraFlick and its licensors. You agree not to use these trademarks without the prior written permission of FloraFlick or the respective owner. Force Majeure FloraFlick shall not be liable for any failure to perform its obligations hereunder where such failure results from any cause beyond FloraFlick's reasonable control, including, without limitation, mechanical, electronic, or communications failure or degradation. Resolution of Disputes Any dispute arising out of or relating to these Terms or your use of the Site shall be governed by the laws of [Your Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law provisions. You agree to submit to the personal jurisdiction of the courts located within [Your Jurisdiction] for the resolution of any such dispute. Assignment These Terms, and any rights and licenses granted hereunder, may not be transferred or assigned by you, but may be assigned by FloraFlick without restriction. Headings The section titles in these Terms are for convenience only and have no legal or contractual effect. Language These Terms of Use may be translated into other languages for convenience or legal requirements. In the event of a conflict between the English version and a translated version, the English version shall govern and prevail. Survival The provisions of these Terms of Use that by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including but not limited to provisions regarding intellectual property, disclaimer of warranties, limitation of liability, indemnification, and jurisdictional issues. Acceptance By accessing or using the FloraFlick website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and any additional terms and conditions referenced herein or made available to you on the Site. User Responsibilities As a user of FloraFlick, you agree to: Provide accurate and current information when creating an account or making a purchase. Maintain the security of your account and promptly notify FloraFlick if you discover any unauthorized access or use. Use the Site in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. Refrain from engaging in any activity that could harm, disable, overburden, or impair the functioning of the Site. Respect the intellectual property rights of FloraFlick and others. pages.index: Welcome to FloraFlick - Your Destination for Beautiful Bouquets and Floral Arrangements +91-881-8881136 floraflick@gmail.com FloraFlick Home Services They choose us Promise How does it work Favorite customers Welcome to FloraFlick Discover the art of floral beauty with FloraFlick. Our expertly crafted bouquets are designed to bring joy and elegance to any occasion. Whether it's a celebration, a heartfelt gift, or just a way to brighten someone's day, our flowers speak the language of love and beauty. Explore our exquisite collections and let FloraFlick be your go-to destination for all your floral needs. Why Choose Us? The FloraFlick Difference Freshness Guaranteed Our flowers are sourced daily from the finest growers to ensure every bouquet is fresh and long-lasting. Expertly Crafted Each arrangement is hand-crafted by our skilled florists, ensuring unique and stunning designs for any occasion. Wide Selection From classic roses to exotic orchids, we offer a diverse range of flowers to suit every taste and preference. Fast Delivery Enjoy same-day delivery in select areas, ensuring your flowers arrive on time and in perfect condition. Customer Satisfaction Our top priority is your happiness. We offer a satisfaction guarantee on all our bouquets, ensuring you receive only the best. Our Promise Unparalleled Service & Quality Personalized Experience At FloraFlick, we believe in the power of personalization. Our team works closely with you to create custom arrangements that perfectly match your vision and occasion. Eco-Friendly Practices We are committed to sustainability. Our flowers are sourced responsibly, and we use eco-friendly packaging to ensure a minimal environmental footprint. How It Works At FloraFlick, we've made it easy to send beautiful bouquets to your loved ones. Follow these simple steps to brighten someone's day with our exquisite floral arrangements. Choose Your Bouquet Browse our wide selection of stunning bouquets and find the perfect arrangement for any occasion. Each bouquet is crafted with care and attention to detail. Place Your Order Select your bouquet and provide the delivery details. Our user-friendly checkout process ensures a seamless and secure transaction. Enjoy Prompt Delivery Sit back and relax as we deliver your chosen bouquet right to the recipient’s door. Enjoy the joy and gratitude that comes with giving the gift of flowers. Our Best Sellers Customer Favorites Classic Roses Timeless and elegant, our classic rose bouquets are perfect for expressing love and admiration. Available in a variety of colors to suit any occasion. Sunny Sunflowers Brighten someone’s day with our vibrant sunflower arrangements. These cheerful blooms are a wonderful way to spread joy and positivity. Elegant Orchids Exotic and sophisticated, our orchid arrangements add a touch of luxury to any setting. Ideal for special occasions or as a stunning decor piece. Mixed Bouquets Can’t decide on one type of flower? Our mixed bouquets offer a beautiful blend of different blooms, creating a harmonious and colorful display. Seasonal Favorites Celebrate the beauty of each season with our specially curated seasonal bouquets. Fresh and in-tune with nature’s cycles, these arrangements are always a hit. Romantic Lilies Express your deepest feelings with our gorgeous lily bouquets. Known for their enchanting fragrance and elegant appearance, lilies are a romantic favorite. Special Offers Special Offers 1 Seasonal Sale Enjoy special discounts on our seasonal bouquets. Perfect for celebrating the beauty of spring, summer, fall, and winter with fresh, vibrant flowers. 2 Bundle & Save Purchase multiple bouquets and save! Our bundle deals offer great value, allowing you to share the joy of flowers with more loved ones. 3 First-Time Buyer Discount New to FloraFlick? Get a special discount on your first purchase as a warm welcome to our floral family. Experience our quality and service at a reduced price. 4 Referral Rewards Love our flowers? Refer a friend and receive a discount on your next order. It’s our way of saying thank you for spreading the word about FloraFlick. Explore Our Collections Featured Bouquets ₹1,200 Enchanted Roses A classic bouquet of red roses, perfect for expressing love and admiration. Hand-tied with care and elegance. Order ₹1,500 Sunny Delight Bright and cheerful sunflowers arranged with lush greenery. Ideal for spreading joy and positivity. Order ₹1,800 Orchid Elegance Exotic white orchids that add a touch of luxury to any occasion. Beautifully presented in a stylish arrangement. Order ₹1,400 Mixed Blooms A vibrant mix of seasonal flowers, carefully arranged to create a stunning and colorful bouquet. Order ₹1,800 Sunshine Blooms Brighten any space with our Sunshine Blooms, a cheerful mix of 12 sunflowers and vibrant seasonal flowers. This radiant bouquet captures the essence of joy and warmth, perfect for celebrations or as a thoughtful gift. Hand-tied and wrapped with care, it brings a touch of sunshine to any occasion. Order Get in Touch We’re here to help! Whether you have a question about our bouquets, need assistance with your order, or want to provide feedback, please fill out the form below. Our dedicated team at FloraFlick will get back to you as soon as possible. Let's make your floral experience exceptional. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - FloraFlick - Your Privacy Matters to Us +91-881-8881136 floraflick@gmail.com FloraFlick Home Services They choose us Promise How does it work Favorite customers Privacy Policy Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by FloraFlick. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. You further acknowledge and agree that FloraFlick shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods, or services available on or through any such websites or services. Children's Privacy Our website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under age 13 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information as quickly as possible. If you believe that we might have any information from or about a child under 13, please contact us at floraflick@gmail.com. International Users If you are accessing our website from outside the United States, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States where our servers are located and our central database is operated. By using our services, you consent to this transfer, processing, and storage of your information in the United States. Your Privacy Rights in India Residents of India have the right to request and obtain from us, once a year and free of charge, information about the categories of personal information (if any) we disclosed to third parties for direct marketing purposes and the names and addresses of any third parties to whom we shared personal information in the preceding calendar year. If you reside in India and would like to make such a request, please submit your request to us in writing using the contact information provided below. Data Retention We will retain your personal information only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies. Consent By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms. Governing Law This Privacy Policy shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Severability If any provision of this Privacy Policy is found to be invalid or unenforceable under applicable law, such provision shall be severed from this Privacy Policy and the remaining provisions shall continue to be valid and enforceable. Updates to This Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time and you should check this Privacy Policy periodically. Your continued use of the Service after we post any modifications to the Privacy Policy on this page will constitute your acknowledgment of the modifications and your consent to abide and be bound by the modified Privacy Policy. Notification of Changes FloraFlick reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page with a new effective date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Additional Information This Privacy Policy applies solely to information collected by FloraFlick. It does not apply to other websites or services linked to or from our site, and we are not responsible for the practices employed by websites or services linked to or from our website, including the information or content contained therein. Please note that when you use a link to go from our website to another website or service, our Privacy Policy is no longer in effect. Your browsing and interaction on any other website or service, including those that have a link on our website, are subject to that website's or service's own rules and policies. Compliance FloraFlick complies with all applicable laws and regulations regarding the collection, storage, and use of personal information. Data Subject Rights As a user of FloraFlick, you have certain rights regarding your personal data under applicable data protection laws. These rights may include: Right to Access: You have the right to request access to your personal data that we hold. Right to Rectification: You have the right to request that we correct any inaccuracies in your personal data. Right to Erasure: You have the right to request that we delete your personal data, under certain conditions. Right to Restrict Processing: You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions. Right to Data Portability: You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions. Legal Basis for Processing Personal Data We may process personal data relating to users if one of the following applies: The user has given their consent for one or more specific purposes. Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract with the user and/or for any pre-contractual obligations thereof. Processing is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation to which FloraFlick is subject. Processing is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by FloraFlick or by a third party. In any case, FloraFlick will gladly help to clarify the specific legal basis that applies to the processing, and in particular whether the provision of personal data is a statutory or contractual requirement, or a requirement necessary to enter into a contract. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at floraflick@gmail.com. This Privacy Policy was last updated on June 14, 2024.
